## Benefits and beneficiaries {.center background-image="pics/peoplebkg.jpg" background-size="contain" background-opacity="0.10"}

::: {.big-ul}
- Students taking the course
- Students who have taken the course
- Anyone starting out with data analysis, who wonders what to do with the raw data from commonly used large-scale cross-national datasets.
- (as long as they have an internet connection)
:::


## Challenges, opportunities, conclusions {.center background-image="pics/peoplebkg.jpg" background-size="contain" background-opacity="0.10"}

::: {.big-ul}
- Developing statistical understanding, coding skills and reproducible workflows in tandem
- But keeping them apart precludes understanding of applied research and reinforces questionable research practices
- To guarantee the credibility of the next generation of social science research, we must face the challenge
:::
